How Legit Are Roobet Promotional Codes?

All promo codes posted on the official website of the online casino, the establishment’s pages on social networks, or pages of partners are completely legal and legitimate. Experienced gamblers are always aware of the latest developments by visiting the official pages and subscribing to updates. This is the best way to keep track of current codes and receive rewards from the casino.

Roobet Casino: Cryptocurrency gambling Website Review

Calling itself a body dedicated to providing a transparent and honest casino experience, Roobet is a newcomer to the online casino industry. These have already established a fairly large fan community after only operating for a year. This is due not only to their commitment to honesty, but also to the fact that they have taken a different and creative approach to their casino design.

Roobet has a couple of benefits not seen by many of its competitors, including anonymous registration, a series of in-house games with a provably fair algorithm, and plenty of generous ongoing promotions designed to keep the community engaged.

Important: Roobet is not available to players in the US, UK, Netherlands, Denmark, Turkey, and a couple of other countries. For the full list of countries restricted by Roobet, please review the Terms of Service (ToS) at the bottom of the website.

🎁 Promo codes

Roobet gives away various promo codes, which are sometimes displayed when you log into your account but are often difficult to find. The codes change from time to time, so we suggest that you keep an eye on their social networks (such as Twitter ) so that you can find codes for one-time promotions and contests that are usually not featured on their website.

If you’re a regular at Roobet, then you should keep up to date with what’s going on around here through the News section. Roobet recently added its News section in May of 2022. You’ll find announcements about partnerships as well as new upcoming bonuses or promotions that will be made available to players or have been made available.

One bonus code that apparently always works is jjwudi , which allows new users to receive a free upgrade to a level 1 account and gives 70 Free Spins worth $80 for you!

🎁 Roowards

There are three different types of Roowards available at Roobet. There’s the daily Rakeback, which requires you to wager at least $1,000, which will let you reach the first tier of the Roowards. As you climb the ladder, you will win more Rakeback passively. The amount that you’re eligible for with a Rakeback will depend on how much you bet the previous day. The more you wager, the more the Rakeback.

There’s a weekly Rakeback as well, which means that after betting $1,500 in different games on Roobet, you’ll be able to improve your cash-back percentage as you level up.

The third type is the monthly bonus. You will receive Roowards based on an assessment of your gameplay throughout the month and it only works if you’ve bet a total of $2,500. The more you play, the more the rewards increase.

🎁 VIP loyalty and rewards program

For high rollers and loyal players, Roobet offers an extensive VIP program. VIPs are assigned their own personal VIP manager, who will contact the player once it has been determined that the player is eligible for the Roobet VIP Club. Additionally, VIPs receive personalized prizes, which are not available to other players, providing them with perks that are better than anything money can buy. Use our code “ jjwudi ” to receive instant VIP Roowards access.

Roobet’s Affiliate Program: Rooferrals

Roobet offers players a chance to earn themselves commission by referring other players to their online casino. The program is called Rooferral . You will be given a Rooferral link that you can give to your friends. By using this link, they’ll be able to boost themselves to level 1. You will be able to receive a commission of 5% on all of your referral’s wagers, for life!

Keep in mind that the user who registers an account, must set their referee within the first 12 hours, otherwise, they will lose the opportunity to do so. Referral earnings, however, can not be claimed until you have referred a total of 10 players, and each of them has earnings above 5 Roolions (1:1 USD).

Casino games

These include Crash (betting that a certain multiplier will appear on a sequence of numbers), Roulette (betting on the outcome of a moving band with colorful symbols), Mines (trying to pick squares with no mines in them on a grid), Dice (betting on what number or set of numbers will appear), and Towers (bet on which column has a star which goes up a tower of columns).

🎲 Slots at Roobet

Roobet has literally hundreds of slots, including some of the latest releases. The most popular slots (Top Picks) are always displayed at the top of the slot page. Slot listings can be sorted by most popular, alphabetically, or by the software provider. Additionally, there is a search box at the top of the slot page which can be used to facilitate the search for a particular game that you are looking for. Most slots cost an average of 20 cents per spin, and for high rollers, there are slots with very high maximum Stakes.

🎲 Table games

Roobet has a comprehensive selection of table games, including several variations of Blackjack, Baccarat, and Roulette. Roobet also offers a proprietary Roulette game in which players must bet which color symbol will be chosen next.

🎲 Live casino games

Roobet offers a modest number of real-time dealer games, which can be accessed from the Blackjack, Baccarat, and Roulette categories. Their selection of live casino games is not as extensive as other casinos, but it still covers the basic game formats for those looking for a live casino experience. It also includes VIP tables for the high rollers and offers rooms with personal dealers in games like Salon Prive.

🎲 Sportsbook

Roobet has launched a great sportsbook where you can easily bet on different types of sports events, like Soccer, Tennis, Basketball, Esports, American Football, FIFA, Darts, Cricket, Ice Hockey, MMA, NBA, Volleyball, eCricket, Handball, Table Tennis, eBaseball, Baseball, eFighting, eTennis, Rocket League, Aussie Rules, Rugby, Formula 1, Boxing, Futsal, Snooker, Bandy, Waterpolo, Floorball, Golf, Cycling, Specials, Lacrosse, Indy Racing, Speedway, Gaelic Football, Gaelic Hurling, Formula E, Motorcycle Racing, Stock Car Racing, etc…

Roobet mobile website

Roobet does not have its own application, but it does have a very responsive version for mobile devices where you can play all the games available (on most devices). Clearly, it’s easier to press small buttons on larger screens, and your device will need a fairly decent processor to handle some of the games.

Otherwise, the mobile version of Roobet looks and behaves very similarly to an application and is capable of performing all the actions available in the browser version of a computer.

Customer Support

Roobet seems to care quite a bit about its reputation among the cryptocurrency gambling community, which is why they provide excellent customer service. In addition to chatting with an agent live (available in English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, and Serbian) or sending an email, it is quite easy to find the answer to a question by writing in the community chat. Additionally, it is possible to interact with customer service agents on Roobet’s social networks, the most popular being Facebook, Twitter, Telegram, Instagram, Twitch, and Spotify.

Payment methods

Roobet is an exclusive cryptocurrency casino, which means that you will need to know how to send and receive cryptocurrencies (such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin or USDT) in order to play at the casino. They also added cash deposits by the end of 2022, like: MuchBetter, Credit Card via PayDo, and AstroPay. You will essentially be buying Crypto to deposit to your account. Deposits are credited to your account as soon as they are detected by the currency’s network (almost instantly), but they will only be withdrawable once the transaction has received at least 3 confirmations. Withdrawals are usually processed within 24 hours, but it is known that sometimes they can take up to 72 hours.

Security and licenses

Roobet is owned by Raw Entertainment B.V., a company incorporated in Limassol, Cyprus. The company owns the Reg No 157205, having its registered address at Fransche Bloemweg 4, Curacao, licensed to conduct online gaming operations by the Government of Curacao under license 8048/JAZ. The Roobet website is protected with 256-bit encryption, which serves to ensure that your personal information is not compromised when accessing the site.

When it comes to gaming fairness, Roobet prides itself on being an open, honest, and transparent casino, so many of its games can be verified for fairness.
